name: Treasure Hunter (itch) (deskita)
description:
You're a pirate-robot trained in pilfering treasure quickly before your rather small battery runs dry. Time to hunt for some treasure. Beware of other robots who seek to siphon your power for themselves.

Controls:

W/S or Up and Down Arrows to go Forwards or Backwards

A/D or Left and Right arrows to rotate character

Space to Jump

E to open chests

Credits:

Textures.com for textures used within the game

Mixamo.com for character animations

Several audio clips sourced from the Humble Bundle 2019 such as from the puzzle music pack for in-game audio.
